name: hyperliquid
description: An MCP server implementation that integrates the Hyperliquid SDK for exchange data.

tools.name: get_all_mids
tools.description: Get mid prices for all coins on Hyperliquid

tools.name: get_candle_snapshot
tools.description: Get candlestick data for a token on Hyperliquid

tools.name: get_l2_book
tools.description: Get the L2 book of a token on Hyperliquid
